title: Massachusetts Public Records Law Request: Police "Referral" Definition

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

I am reaching out in reference to a prior request for public records in the custody of your organization. I work with Erin Stewart at the Center for Public Interest Advocacy & Collaboration, an educational, research and advocacy organization at Northeastern University School of Law. 

In June 2022, Susan Tkaczuk fulfilled Erin’s request for school-based arrest data, including referrals to law enforcement. The records we received are attached for reference. We request clarification of the definition of “referral” used by your police department, including the process for a referral and how it differs from an arrest. 

If you have any questions about this request or need additional time to respond, please contact me. Thank you in advance for your prompt response.

Sincerely,

Norrie Osgood
Research Assistant
Center for Public Interest, Advocacy, and Collaboration
Northeastern University School of Law
osgood.n@northeastern.edu 
(603) 848-2018

title: Massachusetts Public Records Law Request: Police "Referral" Definition

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

I am reaching out in reference to a prior request for public records in the custody of your organization. I work with Erin Stewart at the Center for Public Interest Advocacy & Collaboration, an educational, research and advocacy organization at Northeastern University School of Law. 

In August 2022, Timothy P. Houton fulfilled Erin’s request for school-based arrest data, including referrals to law enforcement. The documents we received are attached for reference. We request clarification of the definition of “referral” used by your police department, including the process for a referral and how it differs from an arrest. 

If you have any questions about this request or need additional time to respond, please contact me. Thank you in advance for your prompt response.

Sincerely,

Norrie Osgood
Research Assistant
Center for Public Interest, Advocacy, and Collaboration
Northeastern University School of Law
osgood.n@northeastern.edu 
(603) 848-2018
